feed.title: DNSLab @ Inha Univ.
feed.subtitle: Distributed and Networked Systems Lab. (DNSLab) of the Department of Computer Engineering, Inha University located in the Incheon Metropolitan City, Republic of Korea is established by [Prof. Heejun Roh](https://www.hjroh.kr) on March 1, 2024. Currently, our research activities include (1) Network Telemetry including network traffic monitoring and classification, (2) Radio Frequency (RF)-powered computing and networking systems, (3) RF sensing and wireless coexistence, and (4) design, implementation, and analysis of various network protocols and networked systems.
